summary: Completed frontend testing for Le Court Central Tennis App - Documents tab and Onboarding flow. All requested features verified working correctly.

issues: Missing data-testid attributes on FAB button, filter chips, and document cards - would improve automated testing

critical_code_review_comments: Documents tab has clean minimalist design with proper category filtering
FAB button uses Pressable for better web compatibility as noted by main agent
Total calculation correctly updates based on filtered documents
Onboarding flow properly checks AsyncStorage for 'onboarding_completed' key
Missing data-testid attributes on interactive elements (FAB, filters, document cards) - recommend adding for better testability
seed_data_creation: None - using sample data from SAMPLE_DOCUMENTS array
context_for_next_testing_agent: Documents tab and onboarding flow are working correctly. FAB button can be clicked at coordinates (1872, 888) on 1920x1080 viewport. Upload modal shows 'Prendre une photo' and 'Sélectionner un fichier' options. All category filters (Tous, Voyages, Factures, Médical, Autres) work correctly and update the total.

features_tested.documents_tab_design: PASS - Minimalist design with orange header, white cards, clean layout

category_filters.voyages: PASS - Shows 2 documents (Billet avion, Hotel Hilton), total 1205€
category_filters.factures: PASS - Shows 2 documents (Restaurant équipe, Taxi aéroport), total 170€
category_filters.autres: PASS - Shows 0 documents with 'Aucun document' empty state, total 0€

features_tested.total_expenses_display: PASS - Total updates correctly based on filtered documents
features_tested.fab_button: PASS - Orange FAB button visible at bottom right, clickable
features_tested.upload_modal: PASS - Opens with 'Ajouter un document' title, shows 'Prendre une photo' and 'Sélectionner un fichier' options
features_tested.onboarding_welcome_screen: PASS - Shows 'Bienvenue' with Le Court Central logo, features list, and 'Commencer' button
features_tested.onboarding_navigation: PASS - Clicking 'Commencer' navigates to /onboarding/step1-prenom with progress bar showing 1/7

onboarding_flow.step1: /onboarding/step1-prenom - Asks for first name with progress bar 1/7
